g.text: Client uploads marked-up PDF ‚Üí PM creates new revision (Rev B, C...) ‚Üí Client reviews again
Analytics: Revision count, days between revisions, avg approval time
‚Ä¢ Material approved ONCE for entire project (not per item)
‚Ä¢ Physical sample sent separately ‚Ä¢ Images & specs in system
Production cannot start until BOTH Drawing AND Material are approved (PM can override with logged reason)

‚úì Dual item paths (Production/Procurement) ‚Ä¢ ‚úì Client portal with approvals ‚Ä¢ ‚úì Revision tracking & analytics ‚Ä¢ ‚úì Flexible report builder ‚Ä¢ ‚úì Excel import ‚Ä¢ ‚úì Role-based dashboards

svg.text: Formula Contract Project Management System | System Requirements Document | January 2026
